description.main: A landing page for my coding and design portfolio, my tutoring services, and eventually my blog.
description.tutoring: Offering online tutoring in math and physics from the middle-school through college levels.

description.blog: A blog about coding and web design, with a particular focus on accessibility, as well as math, physics, or whatever else I'm interested in at the moment.
